membership_acceptance_admin.welcome_text: Welcome to FASE. Your application for {organizationName} has been approved.
membership_acceptance_admin.payment_text: To complete your membership and access our members' portal, please remit your membership dues of €{totalAmount}. Your annual membership will then incept with immediate effect.

membership_acceptance_admin.name: Aline Sullivan
membership_acceptance_admin.title: Chief Operating Officer, FASE

membership_followup.portal_access: As soon as we receive payment, we will be happy to share details on how to access the resources contained in our members' portal.
membership_followup.questions: If you have any questions relating to your membership, please do not hesitate to contact us.
membership_followup.title: Chief Operating Officer

lost_invoice.subject: Outstanding Invoice for FASE
lost_invoice.intro_text: I am writing to follow up on your membership dues for FASE (Fédération des Agences de Souscription Européennes), issued on {invoiceDate}, which remains outstanding. Please let me know the status of this payment.
lost_invoice.follow_up_text: We look forward to activating your FASE membership, providing you with access to the member portal, and inviting you to our upcoming events. If you require any additional documentation or have questions that would assist in processing the payment, please feel free to reach out to me or simply contact admin@fasemga.com. We are now able to provide European banking details, so just let me know if you need those.
lost_invoice.closing_text: Thank you for your time in addressing this. We appreciate your prompt response.
lost_invoice.title: Chief Operating Officer, FASE

bank_transfer_invoice.title: Generate Bank Transfer Invoice
bank_transfer_invoice.subtitle: Generate and receive a PDF invoice for bank transfer payment
bank_transfer_invoice.description: Click the button below to generate and receive your PDF invoice via email. The invoice will include complete bank transfer instructions.
bank_transfer_invoice.success_message: Your PDF invoice has been generated and sent to your email address.
bank_transfer_invoice.next_steps: Please check your email for the invoice with bank transfer instructions. Payment should be made within 30 days.
